config_description: Cannot found this configuration description for this configuration.
developer_understanding_on_working: The _transactionDeepCopyMode configuration option is used when creating a Prevayler instance. It is passed as a parameter to the PrevaylerImpl constructor.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The triggering frequency of the _transactionDeepCopyMode configuration option depends on when a new Prevayler instance is created. It is triggered whenever a new Prevayler instance is created.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: The impact of the _transactionDeepCopyMode configuration option on the system is related to how transactions are handled. Depending on the value of _transactionDeepCopyMode, the system may perform deep copies of transactions which can impact memory usage and performance.
